All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Camera
The Camera class represents a virtual camera in a three-dimensional scene.
Color
The Color class represents a color using RGB components.
ColorTest
 
DirectionalLight
The DirectionalLight class represents a directional light source in a three-dimensional scene.
Intersection
The Intersection class represents an intersection between a ray and a scene object.
Light
The Light class represents a light source in a three-dimensional scene.
LightTest
 
Material
The Material class represents the material properties of an object in a three-dimensional scene.
Plane
The Plane class represents a plane object in a three-dimensional scene.
Point
The Point class represents a three-dimensional point in space.
PointLight
The PointLight class represents a point light source in a three-dimensional scene.
PointTest
 
Ray
The Ray class represents a ray in a three-dimensional scene.
RayTracer
The RayTracer class is responsible for rendering a 3D scene to a 2D image using ray tracing.
Scene
The Scene class represents a 3D scene composed of objects, lights, and a camera for rendering.
Scene.Intersection
The Intersection class represents a point of intersection between a ray and an object in the scene.
SceneBuilder
The SceneBuilder class is used to construct a Scene by adding lights, objects, and configuring a camera.
SceneObject
The SceneObject class represents an abstract object in a three-dimensional scene.
SceneParser
The SceneParser class is used to parse a scene description file and construct a Scene object based on the file's content.
SceneParserTest
 
Sphere
The Sphere class represents a three-dimensional sphere object in a scene.
SphereTest
 
Triangle
The Triangle class represents a three-dimensional triangle object in a scene.
Triplet
The Triplet class represents a three-dimensional vector or point with three coordinates (x, y, and z).
TripletTest
 
Vector
The Vector class represents a three-dimensional vector in space.
VectorTest
